attributes.action: Not allow Trump to visit the U.K. on a state visit because of inciting hatred.
attributes.additional_details: The video suggested that the dutch man on crutches was being attacked by a Muslim and migrant where in fact, Dutch news agencies stated that this was fake. Donald Trump has not issued an apology.
attributes.background: Donald Trump has spewed hatred across his twitter account for far too long and has gone across the line way too many times. He re-tweeted a FALSE far-right propaganda video that was posted by the hateful group Britain First, attacking Muslims and migrants. These are not "British values."
